course_name: Criminology and Criminal Justice Research Thesis
description: The Criminology and Criminal Justice Research Thesis involves a one semester intensive program of research. Students will work closely with a supervisor to produce an original piece of research using primary or secondary data. Theory research theses are also allowed.
restricted: Restricted to students enrolled in the Bachelor of Criminology and Criminal Justice (Honours). A grade point average of 5.5 is required to enrol.
